category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: StructureContextShownColumnWidthsPref
preference.preference_description: Specifies the column widths for the columns (identified by StructureContextColumnsShownPref) displayed in the BOM tree table within the Collaboration Manufacturing Engineering applications. This preference value is only a repository, and it is not to be modified other than by the code itself.
